mapper.select: SELECT A.DELIVERY_NO ,A.EVENT_NO ,C.EVENT_NAME ,( CASE A.M_NO WHEN C.M_NO1 THEN '1등' WHEN C.M_NO2 THEN '2등' WHEN C.M_NO3 THEN '3등' END ) AS SCORE ,A.ITEM_NO ,D.ITEM_NAME ,A.M_NO ,A.DELIVERY_ADDR ,A.STEP_FLAG ,B.CODENAME AS STEP_FLAG_STR ,(CASE WHEN A.EVENT_DATE IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) AS STEP1_STATUS ,(CASE WHEN A.STEP1_DATE IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) AS STEP2_STATUS ,(CASE WHEN A.STEP2_DATE IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) AS STEP3_STATUS ,(CASE WHEN A.STEP3_DATE IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) AS STEP4_STATUS ,A.EVENT_DATE AS STEP1_DATE ,A.STEP1_DATE AS STEP2_DATE ,A.STEP2_DATE AS STEP3_DATE ,A.STEP3_DATE AS STEP4_DATE FROM THISDELIVERY A LEFT JOIN TMSTCODE B ON B.GRPCODE = 13 AND A.STEP_FLAG = B.CODE LEFT JOIN TMSTEVENT C ON A.EVENT_NO = C.EVENT_NO LEFT JOIN TMSTITEM D ON A.EVENT_NO = D.EVENT_NO AND A.ITEM_NO = D.ITEM_NO WHERE A.DELIVERY_NO = #{param1}
